message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but that price is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. However, I've invested a lot in this product and I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $13,500.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to go up to $12,500. This is my final offer.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12,500. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'm counteroffering at $13,000. This is my final offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle if you're willing to meet me at $13,000.
